item.description:
We attended this as a group Meetup the first year, and it was an amazing time. You could tell on the players faces how exciting it was to play at Fenway - and these guys played hard.

Buy your tickets now, or at least RSVP. General seating. The first year, Frank and I sat behind home plate. Pretty cool.  TICKETS

*******************

For the third time in as many years, the Cape Cod Baseball League All-Star game will return to Fenway Park. Catch the stars of tomorrow when the best players on the Cape make the trip to Boston. Major League Baseball rosters are currently filled with more than 230 Cape League alumni, including current Red Sox Jason Varitek, Kevin Youkilis, and Jacoby Ellsbury.

The family friendly event will feature a pre-game Home Run Derby, autograph session with the all-stars, and a silent auction filled with baseball memorabilia. Discounted concession items will also be available.

Tickets are all general admission and priced at only $10 each.

Any and all tickets purchased on the Cape will have an added bonus. Purchase your tickets today or at any Cape game and receive a $100* Jordan’s Furniture gift card with every pair of tickets purchased! Tickets purchased on-line will be mailed in May with the Jordan’s gift card.   (*NOTE: Jordan’s gift is good toward the purchase of $1000 or more)
item.why: See the future of the Boston Red Sox from the Monster Seats or from behind Home Plate.
item.name: Cape Cod Baseball All Star Game at Fenway!
